DataElement.preferredDefinition: The kind of database update for the tracking of patient specimen numbers.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Tracking Patient Tracking Number Data Refresh
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._The act or process of following a person, animal, or object through space or time._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The act or process of following a person, animal, or object through space or time._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification._A process where all the data in a database environment is updated.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The act or process of following a person, animal, or object through space or time.: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification. : Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.: To a complete degree or to the full or entire extent.: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
